spell1.name: ENCEPHALO-RAY
spell1.description: Unleash a burning energy beam. Ultron fires a first constant hitscan beam for multiple rounds, then emits a burst of energy as a cylindrical spell field.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: First constant beam; Second single-cast cylindrical spell field

attributes.label: DAMAGE
attributes.value: First beam 6 rounds in 0.5s, 12 per hit; Second single-cast spell field 75 per hit

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 75% at 30m

spell2.name: RAGE OF ULTRON
spell2.description: Summon Ultron Drones to fire Encephalo-Rays, damaging enemies or healing allies. Creates a spell field upon impact; Ultron is Unstoppable during the ultimate and self-heals.

attributes.label: CASTING
attributes.value: Straight-line projectile that generates a spell field upon impact

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Ultron gains Unstoppable during the duration

spell5.name: IMPERATIVE: FIREWALL
spell5.description: Summon drones to grant Bonus Health to allies within range, centered on Ultron and the ally marked by Imperative: Patch.

attributes.label: BONUS HEALTH TO ALLIES NEAR ULTRON AND THE DRONES
SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Grants Bonus Health to Ultron and allies within range; affects the ally designated by Imperative: Patch

spell4.name: IMPERATIVE: PATCH
spell4.description: Command a giant drone to follow an ally, constantly healing allies in its radius (higher HPS on the designated ally).

attributes.label: HEALING AMOUNT TO THE TARGETED ALLY
HEALING AMOUNT TO OTHER ALLIES WITHIN RANGE
MAX TOLERANCE DURATION OUT OF SIGHT

spell3.name: DYNAMIC FLIGHT
spell3.description: Fly quickly in the direction of movement and then enter an Accelerated state.

attributes.label: DASH DIRECTION
attributes.value: Reticle direction combined with key input

attributes.label: SPECIAL EFFECT
attributes.value: Triggers a one-time dash followed by a constant accelerated effect

spell6.name: NANO RAY (Team-Up)
spell6.description: With Iron Man (Stark Protocol): Ultron channels a piercing Nano Ray that damages enemies and heals allies.

attributes.label: RANGE
attributes.value: 2.5m radius, infinite length cylindrical spell field

attributes.label: DAMAGE FALLOFF
attributes.value: Falloff begins at 20m, decreasing to 75% at 30m

attributes.label: TEAM-UP
attributes.value: Stark Protocol (Iron Man Anchor; also pairs with Squirrel Girl for Squirrel Missile)
